00155     #define MAMA_LINK_BRIDGE(implIdentifier, impl)                  \
00156     do                                                              \
00157     {                                                               \
00158         implIdentifier ## Bridge_createImpl (impl);                 \
00159     }                                                               \
00160     while(0)                                                        \
00161 
00162     #define MAMA_CREATE_BRIDGE(implIdentifier, impl)                \
00163     do                                                              \
00164     {                                                               \
00165         if (MAMA_LINK_##implIdentifier)                             \
00166         {                                                           \
00167             implIdentifier##Bridge_createImpl (impl);               \
00168         }                                                           \
00169         else                                                        \
00170         {                                                           \
00171             mama_loadBridge (impl, "##implIdentifier##");           \
00172         }                                                           \
00173     }                                                               \
00174     while(0)                                                        \
00175 
00176     /******** End of multi-impl section   ********/
00177 
00178     /******************************************************************************
00179      * Global initialization and configuration.
00180      */

00403 #ifdef WITH_ENTITLEMENTS

00407     typedef enum
00408     {
00409         /*Disconnection request sent by administrator via site server GUI*/
00410         SESSION_DISCONNECT_REASON_ADMIN               = 0,
00411         /*Disconnection request sent due to user reaching concurrent access limit*/
00412         SESSION_DISCONNECT_REASON_NEW_CONNECTION      = 1,
00413         /*Disconnection request sent due to an entitlements modification resulting in user now exceeding concurrent access limit*/
00414         SESSION_DISCONNECT_REASON_ENTITLEMENTS_UPDATE = 2,
00415 
00416         SESSION_DISCONNECT_REASON_INVALID             = 101
00417     } sessionDisconnectReason;
00418
